Alternate Contact: Candice Henriques, Behaviour and Mental Health Services Program Director; Email: chenriques@arcprograms.com
Primary Executive: Patrick McIntosh, Director of Services; Phone:  * 250.763.2977; Fax: 250.763.6060; Email: pmcintosh@arcprograms.com
Service Details: - Offers services for children and youth, ages 6-18, diagnosed under the Autism Spectrum under the supervision of a behavior analyst/consultant - In-home behavioral assessment, parent and family consultations - Positive behavior intervention - Coordination and implementation of IHCAN or other assessment recommendations - Group and individual services for the child/youth target social skills, communication, life skills, and peer relationships
Eligibility: Ages: 6 year(s) - 18 year(s)Those with a diagnosis under the Autism Spectrum (restricted to age range 6 - 18 years)
How to Apply: Community or self-referral with a diagnosis on the Autism Spectrum
Cost: - On a fee-for-service basis- Funding is available by application for those with a diagnosis under the Autism Spectrum through the Autism Funding: Ages 6-18 Program Ministry of Children and Family Development
Address & Map: 513 Bernard AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 6N9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - Ground level access off of Bernard Avenue
